summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4054 for the improvement of the alley in block 6, Thompson's University Addition, being the alley between 16th Avenue Northeast and 17th Avenue Northeast, from East 55th Street to East 56th STreet, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 48948, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
